ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine took the scanner in his hand and pressed delete. I don t want to change a friend to gain a partner, besides Shadow Wings a dumb name for a wolf. he

Lunarpine took the scanner in his hand and pressed delete.

"I don't want to change a friend to gain a partner, besides Shadow 
Wings a dumb name for a wolf." he handed the scanner back to Shadow 
Wing. "Next time you plan a stunt like this ask me first."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She handed the scanner to him. "Are you sure about this? I mean, I 
am 
> willing to do this." She looked at the she scanner.  She was just 
so 
> sure he would have jumped at the chance to have a wolf as a 
partner. 
> And have her as the wolf partner.  "Well, if your sure about it, 
them 
> I won't try to change."  She looked at the floor.  
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Lunarpine turns to face Shadow Wing, "It would make me happy, but 
> for all
> > the wrong reasons, I'm a wolf plain and simple, you're an owl, if 
> you
> > changed that for me I'd never forgive myself., if it changed your
> > programming as well as your look. "
> > 
> > "Give me the scanner Wing" he said in a gentle voice as he 
extended 
> his hand
> > to her.
